net.tfobz.vokabeltrainer.model

Class Karte

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tfobz.vokabeltrainer.model.Karte

  • public class Karte
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a flashcard containing two words, a question direction, and information on whether case sensitivity should be considered when comparing the words. Both words must be provided to create a valid card.

    This class is used within the vocabulary trainer application to facilitate the learning and testing of word pairs in different directions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Karte

        public Karte()
        Default constructor for Karte.

      • Karte

        public Karte(int nummer,
             java.lang.String wortEins,
             java.lang.String wortZwei,
             boolean richtung,
             boolean grossKleinschreibung)
        Constructs a Karte with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        nummer - The unique identifier for the card.
        wortEins - The first word of the card.
        wortZwei - The second word of the card.
        richtung - The direction of the question (true for wortEins to wortZwei, false otherwise).
        grossKleinschreibung - Whether to consider case sensitivity when comparing words.

        fnummer - The fach number associated with the card.

      • getGerlerntAm

        public java.util.Date getGerlerntAm()
        Retrieves the date when the card was learned.
        Returns:
        The learning date.

      • getFachBeschreibung

        public java.lang.String getFachBeschreibung()
        Retrieves the description of the subject area.
        Returns:
        The fach description.

      • validiere

        public void validiere()
        Validates that both wortEins and wortZwei have been entered. If either word is missing, an error message is added to the fehler hashtable.

      • getRichtig

        public boolean getRichtig(java.lang.String wort)
        Determines whether the provided word matches the expected word based on the question direction and case sensitivity settings.
        Parameters:
        wort - The word to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the word is correct, false otherwise.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Checks if this Karte is equal to another object. Two Karten are considered equal if they have the same nummer, wortEins, and wortZwei.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - The object to compare with.
        Returns:
        true if the objects are equal, false otherwise.

      • getFehler

        public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getFehler()
        Retrieves the error messages generated during validation.
        Returns:
        A hashtable containing error messages, or null if there are no errors.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the Karte.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string containing the nummer, wortEins, wortZwei, grossKleinschreibung, and richtung.

      • getRichtung

        public boolean getRichtung()
        Determines the direction of the question.
        Returns:
        true if the question direction is from wortEins to wortZwei, false otherwise.

        public boolean getGrossKleinschreibung()
        Checks whether case sensitivity is considered when comparing words.
        Returns:
        true if case sensitivity is enabled, false otherwise.
